text: Share is a Caribbean Canadian and Black Canadian community newspaper, based in Toronto, Ontario. Canada's largest ethnic newspaper, Share has two times the circulation of any other Canadian newspaper serving the same ethnic community. It is distributed free of charge in many locations, particularly in the Greater Toronto Area. The weekly publication, on quarter-folded, tabloid-sized newsprint, includes news from the Caribbean and Africa, sports, entertainment, business, religion, analysis, and commentaries from its community's point of view. Arnold Auguste is the newspaper's publisher. Founded in April 1978, Share is owned by Arnold A. Auguste Associates Limited. ==External links== * Share Newspaper Category:Black Canadian culture in Toronto Category:Canada–Caribbean relations Category:Caribbean-Canadian culture in Ontario Category:Newspapers published in Toronto Category:Multicultural and ethnic newspapers published in Canada Category:Publications established in 1978 Category:Weekly newspapers published in Ontario Category:1978 establishments in Ontario
title: Share (newspaper)
